data.title: The EPAC Victory Troupe receives Community Arts Grant from the Community Foundation of South Central NY in 2024!
data.meta_description: Thank you to the Community Foundation of South Central New York for awarding the EPAC Victory Troupe a Community Arts Grant for $5,000. The EPAC Victory Troupe project was made possible by a grant from the Stephen J. and Betty E. Purtell Fund of the Community Foundation of South Central New York. The EPAC Victory Troupe is a musical theater workshop for people with special needs.The EPAC Victory Troupe 2024 just finished a six week theatrical workshop that culminated into a Live Musical Performa
data.text:
Thank you to the Community Foundation of South Central New York for awarding the EPAC Victory Troupe a Community Arts Grant for $5,000. The EPAC Victory Troupe project was made possible by a grant from the Stephen J. and Betty E. Purtell Fund of the Community Foundation of South Central New York.The EPAC Victory Troupe is a musical theater workshop for people with special needs.

The EPAC Victory Troupe 2024 just finished a six week theatrical workshop that culminated into a Live Musical Performance at EPAC. Watch the full show HERE on the EPAC Website! The packed audience was cheering and applauding with tears of joy in their eyes watching their loved ones sing and dance in the spot light. The community is still raving about the show, and we can't wait to see them on the EPAC Stage again later this year. Be on the look out this summer for the EPAC Victory Troupe at the Endicott PawFest July 21st, and the Shakespeare Festival at George W. Johnson Park in Endicott on August 18th.

This financial support from the Community Foundation will allow EPAC to continue this amazing project that has been received so well by the whole community, and is so deserving. THANK YOU!
